state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First off, go east. Then, try to take a trip north. That done, make an effort to head east. That done, try to head south. Next, travel east. If you can manage that, try to go north. With that over with, take a trip north. With that over with, attempt to travel west. Once you succeed at that, travel north. Okay, and then, venture west. With that over with, take a trip west. Then, make an attempt to go to the south. And then, attempt to travel south. Next, recover the latchkey from the refrigerator. Got that? Good! -= Bar =- You are in a typical kind of place. That is to say, you're in a bar. You can see a safe. What a letdown! The safe is empty! Hey, want to see a bed? Look over there, a bed. The bed is standard. Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Bar =-0/1
